meeting_info.organization: City Council Ad Hoc Committee on Legislative Affairs
meeting_info.location: Council Briefing Room, 6ES City Hall, Dallas, Texas (videoconference available)

agenda_items.title: Approval of the January 6, 2025, Ad Hoc Committee on Legislative Affairs Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Consider recommending the movement of the item 'Amend local government election dates and authorize ranked choice voting for local government elections'
agenda_items.description: Recommendation to move the item from Pursue to Support within the state legislative program appendix.

agenda_items.title: Consider recommending the movement of the item 'Enhance safety for residents of senior facilities'
agenda_items.description: Recommendation to move the item from Monitor to Support within the state legislative program appendix.

agenda_items.title: Consider recommending the movement of the item 'Support transparency in utility operations and grid reliability'
agenda_items.description: Recommendation to move the item from Support to Monitor within the state legislative program appendix.

agenda_items.title: Consider recommending the movement of the item 'Support rail safety legislation to ensure transparency and protection of local communities'
agenda_items.description: Recommendation to move the item from Support to Monitor within the state legislative program appendix.

agenda_items.title: Consider recommending the movement of the item 'Promote proper mental and physical healthcare for all, including participation in Medicaid'
agenda_items.description: Recommendation to move the item from Support to Monitor within the state legislative program appendix.

agenda_items.title: Consider recommending the movement of the item 'Seek clarity regarding card rooms'
agenda_items.description: Recommendation to move the item from Monitor to Pursue within the state legislative program appendix.
